text: now one admin note is I know a lot of people talk about the dark pool volume and how you don't really get to see the actual volume there's just an important difference between dark pool ATS transactions versus transactions that are internalized they're kind of different things so with dark poool orders they still will hit the Consolidated tape it's just delayed if it's internalized that will not hit the tape you're not going to see that so if orders there's heavy internalization of orders you're not going to see any of the follow through and that's one of the problems with GameStop and I actually don't know to what degree the orders are being internalized and if anybody has good research on that I genuinely would love to be able to take a look at it if you have access to it let me know so that I can take a peek throw it in the comments below because I'm very interested in that question because we know that for GameStop the off exchange volume is massive however if we take a look at the off Exchange volume today was 47.64 and the 30-day average is 52 so a little bit lighter than that now again the problem with this is we don't actually know of this off exchange volume how much of it is internalized versus not in this case obviously I would assume not internalized because we have a number but this then doesn't help us
